attributes.additional_details: We need the government and parliament to readdress this situation soon as possible
attributes.background: I want councils in coastal areas to step up and stop the mass gathering of people on beaches during the pandemic

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government

rejection.details:
The Government is responsible for determining restrictions across England, but decisions about local matters such as the closure of beaches is a matter for individual local authorities, and enforcement of any restrictions is a matter for the local police.

If you want beaches in your area to be closed you may wish to contact your local authority about this.
